basic.description: A general survey course dealing with various aspects of conservation and museology. The course deals with professional ethics, control of the factors causing deterioration and with preventive conservation including care in handling, transporting, and storing cultural property. Open to upper-year undergraduate students with permission of the Department.
basic.subject: ARTH
basic.title: Conservation Principles

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    A GPA of 2.6 in 24.0 units in  ARTH and Level 4 and registration in an ARTH Major or Medial Plan.
